channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- CICS TX Standard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- CICS TX Standard

item.title: CVE-2022-34167|2024-09-17T01:01:13.369Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20standard
item.description: IBM CICS TX Standard and Advanced 11.1 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 229432.
